owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.durationWeeks: How many weeks (0 = permanent until removed)
params.imageUri: IPFS or URL to ad image

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.imageUri: IPFS or URL to ad image

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateRentalCost(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculate rental cost for an ad space

getActiveAdsForLocation(uint8).notice: Get all active ads for a location

getCurrentAdForSpace(uint256).notice: Get current ad for a space

getNextCarouselAd(uint8).notice: Get next ad in carousel rotation

getSpacesForLocation(uint8).notice: Get all ad spaces for a location

rentAdSpace(uint256,string,string,string.notice: Rent an ad space with PLS

setWeeklyRate(uint256).notice: Update weekly rate (default for all spaces)
